column3: Traffic;Koh Kong:------ At 1:15 pm on February 1
column5: a foreign man had a motorcycle accident and was sent to the hospital.------James Miller
column6: a 63-year-old male from the United States of America living in Koh Kong Province
column7: suffered injuries to his head and arms..------The American was sent to Koh Kong Hospital for treatment
column8: while his motorbike was sent to the police station of Russey Chrum commune. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/410769
